example.parse: (SQ (VP (PRT (INTERROG_PART هل)) (IV3FS+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:I تُعدي) (NP-SBJ (NOUN_PROP باكستان)) (NP-OBJ (NP (NOUN+CASE_INDEF_ACC دولاً) (ADJ+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_INDEF_ACC اسلامية) (ADJ+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_INDEF_ACC عدة)) (SBAR (WHNP-3 (-NONE- 0)) (S (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3FS ساهمت) (PP-CLR (PP (PREP في) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN تعزيز) (SBAR-NOM (WHNP-1 (REL_PRON ما)) (S (VP (IV3FS+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:I تسمي) (NP-OBJ-4 (NP (IVSUFF_DO:3MS ه)) (NP (-NONE- *T*-1))) (NP-SBJ (NOUN_PROP اميركا)) (S (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *-4)) (NP-PRD (NOUN+CASE_INDEF_ACC ارهاباً)))))))) (PUNC ?))

arg.g: a number of Islamic states that have helped strengthen what America calls terrorism?

example.arg: دولاً اسلامية عدة ساهمت في تعزيز ما تسميه اميركا ارهاباً

role.argrole: germ, with what (if seperate from arg0) - usually marked with ﺑ

example.parse: ﻣﻦ اﻟﻤﻤﻜﻦ أن ﻳﻌﺪي اﻟﻨﺎس ﺑﻌﻀﻬﻢ اﻟﺒﻌﺾ ﺑﺎﻟﺤﻤﻰ
